description: Calls are made for Tynwald to hold a "reflective conversation" about racism on the island.
title: Isle of Man parliament to have 'thoughtful' debate on racism
title_page: Isle of Man parliament to have 'thoughtful' debate on racism - BBC News
maintext: "As a general debate it's an opportunity to start a conversation and some thinking. And hopefully we will see good outcomes and actions in due course, just because we're starting to think more about this."
